content: पीड् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (पीडयति-ते, पीडित) {@--1@} To pain, torment, harm, hurt, injure, harass, annoy, molest; नीलं च पीपिडच्छरैः <ls>Bk. 15. 82</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 343</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 67</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 4.">238</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 29.</ls> {@--2@} To oppose, resist. {@--3@} To besiege (as a city). {@--4@} To press or squeeze together, compress, pinch; कंठे पीडयन् <ls>Mk. 8</ls>; लभेत सिकतासु तैलमपि यत्नतः पीडयन् <ls>Bh. 2. 5</ls>; दशनपीडिताधरा <ls>R. 19. 35.</ls> {@--5@} To suppress, destroy; <ls>Ms. 1. 51.</ls> {@--6@} To neglect. {@--7@} To cover with anything inauspicious. {@--8@} To eclipse. {@--9@} To overpower. {@--10@} To break, violate. {@--11@} To take away, remove. {@--12@} To stir, agitate. {@--13@} To cover, wrap.
